backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor implementing the MediScan AI backend with user profile management, CT scan upload/retrieval, external AI API configuration, and role-based access control via authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old actor state (with separate apiEndpoint/apiKey fields) into the new state shape using a combined ExternalApiConfig optional record.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the API Configuration modal dialog feature to its implementing files (ApiConfigDialog.tsx and useQueries.ts) with associated test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the purpose and recent changes of each component and hook.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind layers and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application, setting the page title to 'Medical Imaging Analysis Application' and mounting the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages authentication state, profile loading, and conditionally renders LoginScreen, ProfileSetup, or the main Dashboard layout with Header and Footer.
Admin-only modal dialog for configuring the external AI API endpoint URL and API key, with inline field validation, loading state, pre-filled values from the backend, and styled Cancel/Save buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying a dynamic copyright year and a medical disclaimer note.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header showing the MediScan AI brand, logged-in user profile info, a conditionally rendered API Config button for admins, and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the MediScan AI login page with feature highlights (AI analysis, speed, security) and an Internet Identity login button that handles authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a form for new users to enter their name, department, and specialization, then saves the profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation.
frontend/src/components/ScanCard.tsx: Renders a card for a single CT scan showing its thumbnail image, analyzed/pending status badge, and tumor detection result if analysis exists.
frontend/src/components/ScanDetailDialog: Modal dialog that shows detailed CT scan information including original and mask images in tabs, tumor stage/analysis results, and a button to trigger AI analysis if the API is configured.
frontend/src/components/ScansListTab.tsx: Fetches and displays all CT scans as a grid of ScanCards, showing a loading spinner or empty-state prompt when appropriate, and opens a ScanDetailDialog on card click.
frontend/src/components/UploadScanTab.ts: Provides a form to upload a CT scan image with a patient ID, shows a live preview of the selected file, and submits the scan via the `useUploadScan` mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Computer Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, CT scan upload/retrieval/analysis, and external API configuration management, with toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens including standard UI colors and medical-specific color variables using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page component that renders a two-tab interface (All Scans and Upload New) for managing CT scans, switching between ScansListTab and UploadScanTab components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to clean sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH-based design tokens, medical color palette, custom border radii, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the CT scan AI tumor detection app on ICP, tracking existing features, pending feature requests (API configuration dialog and backend persistence), and architectural notes.
